pr_title: Gradle dev mode test support and basic test

timeline.message:
* Basic Gradle quarkusDev test
* Include resources directories into the build classpath in dev mode
* Include all the artifact's paths into the index if at least one of the artifact's dirs contains a marker file

* Basic Gradle quarkusDev test

timeline.bodyText: This may need adjustment. Previously it used to look for the markers in the deployment classloader, which includes more resources than the list of the deployment deps the resolver returns.
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: Yea, this needs to be user deps, not deployment deps.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas
